about.title: About Us
about.h1: Amanicare – Care with Professionalism and Heart
about.p1: Welcome to Amanicare – your care service that offers more than just daily assistance. We provide care with expertise, warmth, and respect – and with a deep understanding of you. Your trust is what matters to us.
about.p2: Our founder, Sandra Atea, is a certified geriatric nurse and care service manager. She established Amanicare to enable high-quality care that not only works but touches the heart. The name Amani – Swahili for peace – is our promise: We bring calm, dignity, and comfort to your everyday life.
about.h2: What We Offer – Our Services According to SGB XI and §45b SGB XI
about.p3: At Amanicare, you receive all home care services as per the Social Security Code XI, including:
about.l1a: Basic care (e.g., assistance with personal hygiene, dressing, and toileting)
about.l1b: Mobility support (e.g., help with standing, walking, or positioning)
about.l1e: Care and relief services under §45b SGB XI – e.g., for daily companionship or support for family caregivers
about.p4: We provide care tailored to your individual wishes, needs, and life circumstances.
about.l2a: Loving, professional care that puts the person at the center
about.l2c: Culturally sensitive care that respects your background, traditions, and needs
about.l2d: Time to listen, patience to understand, and heart to care
about.p5: Whether you’re seeking support for yourself or a loved one – with us, you’ll find more than just care: You’ll find trust, empathy, compassion, and attentive companionship on equal terms.
